Mythos Ability: Investigators cannot gain Stamina except by receiving medical care in St. Mary's Hospital (or from Vincent Lee).
Mi-Go have their toughness increased by 2. If an investigator passes a Combat check against a Mi-Go, he draws 1 extra Unique Item.
Each player may pass a Luck (-1) check to be Blessed.
Will checks in Arkham are made at a -1 penalty. Sneak checks in Arkham are made at a +1 bonus. Fliers do not move.
All monsters in the Sky and Outskirts are returned to the cup.
All Gugs and Nightgaunts in Arkham are returned to the cup. If at least one monster returns to the cup, raise the terror level by 1.
Luck checks in Arkham are made at a -1 penalty. Sneak checks in Arkham are made at a +1 bonus.

Investigators who end their movement in Rivertown streets may choose to delve into dark mysteries using their life force. They roll dice equal to their current Stamina, and for every failed die, they lose 1 Stamina. If this reduces them to 0 Stamina, they are devoured and the player must start a new character. Otherwise, they gain 3 Clue tokens.
All investigators in jail are released. No investigators may be arrested until the end of next turn. Leave this card in play until then to indicate this.
All monsters in the Miskatonic U. Streets or Locations are returned to the cup.
All monsters in the Southside streets or locations are returned to the cup.
The General Store, Curiositie Shoppe, and Ye Olde Magick Shoppe are closed until the end of next turn. Leave this card in play until then to indicate this.
Any investigator who ends his movement in the streets must pass a Will (+0) check or be arrested and taken to the Police Station.
Investigators who end their movement in the Northside streets gain 1 Clue token from the sinister wonders they witness, but must pass a Will (-1) check or lose 1 Sanity.
Ongoing Effect: Roll a die at the end of every Mythos Phase while this card is in play (beginning the turn after it entered play). On a 1 or 2, increase the terror level by 1.
Pass: If a single player discards 2 gate trophies during the Arkham Encounter Phase while in the Rivertown streets, return this card to the box. Each player draws 1 Spell.
Fail: If the terror level reaches 10, return this card to the box. Every investigator is Cursed.

Mythos Ability: Investigators cannot gain Sanity except by receiving psychiatric care at Arkham Asylum (or from Carolyn Fern).
Any investigator who ends his movement in the Miskatonic U. streets may pass a Lore (-1) check to gain 1 Clue token by reading the strange hieroglyphics on the artifacts in the exhibit.
Investigators who end their movement in the Uptown streets may draw 2 Unique Items and purchase one, none, or both of them at list price, discarding any that are not purchased
The terror level increases by 1 in light of this tragic news.
All monsters in the streets are returned to the cup.
Investigators cannot move into or out of the Merchant Dist. streets until the end of next turn. Leave this card in play until then to indicate this
All monsters in the Easttown streets or locations are returned to the cup.
An ancient ghost ship arrives in Arkham, releasing 2 monsters into the Merchant Dist. streets
All Dark Young in Arkham are returned to the cup. If at least one monster returns to the cup, raise the terror level by 1.

When this card enters play, place 6 Clue tokens on it. Any player may spend Clue tokens during the Arkham Encounter Phase while in the Easttown streets to discard Clue tokens from this card on a 1-for-1 basis.
Pass: If there are no Clue tokens on this card, return it to the box. Each player draws one unique item
Fail: If there are 10 Clue tokens on this card, return it to the box. All elder sign tokens are removed from the board.

Mythos Ability: Due to the renewed prosperity that has come to Arkham, the terror level cannot increase
Fight checks in Arkham are made at a -1 penalty. Lore checks in Arkham are made at a +1 bonus. Fire Vampires have their toughness increased by 1
An ancient stone is disturbed by the construction, releasing 2 monsters into the Miskatonic U. streets
Investigators receive 1 less movement point during the Movement Phase. Fast Monsters move like normal monsters
The first player must pass a Luck (-1) check or be Cursed
A Silver Lodge ritual lets 2 monsters loose in the French Hill streets.
All monsters in the French Hill streets or locations are returned to the cup.
All monsters in locations are returned to the cup.
All monsters in the Merchant Dist. streets or locations are returned to the cup.
Any Elder Things previously claimed as monster trophies by players return to life and are placed in the River Docks.
All investigators currently lost in time and space immediately return to Arkham, appearing in a street or location of their choice.

Mythos: No One Can Help You Now
Mythos Ability: Gates cannot be sealed, although they can still be closed
It costs 2 fewer Clue tokens to seal gates
A careless picnicker unleashes 2 monsters on the Downtown streets
Thanks to the mystic energy generated by the planetary alignment, all Spells have a Sanity cost of 0.

Mythos: Police Step Up Patrols in Northside!
Mythos Ability: All monsters in the Northside streets or locations are returned to the cup.
All monsters in the Uptown streets or locations are returned to the cup
Star Spawn and Maniacs have their toughness increased by 1. The difficulty to seal or close gates to R'lyeh is increased by 1.

Speed checks in Arkham are made at a -1 penalty, and players receive one less movement point during theMovement Phase. Sneak checks in Arkham are made at a +1 bonus. Return any Fire Vampires in play to the cup. If a Fire Vampire enters play, return it to the cup and draw a different monster.
All monsters in the Rivertown streets or locations are returned to the cup.
All Dimensional Shamblers and Hounds of Tindalos are returned to the cup. If one or more monster is returned to the cup, raise the terror level by 1.

Mythos: Sheldon Gang Turns to Police for Aid!
Pass: The Sheldon Gang disturbs a burial mound, releasing 2 monsters into the Uptown Streets.

Mythos Ability: An old basement is opened, releasing 2 monsters into the Easttown Streets
Due to the interference of the solar eclipse, no spells may be cast
However, the press is mistaken, and the murders were caused by 2 monsters that are released into the Southside streets.
The Library, Administration Building and Science Building are all closed until the end of next turn. Leave this card in play until then to indicate this
All investigators in Other World areas may immediately return to Arkham
All Chthonians and Dholes in Arkham are returned to the cup. If at least one monster returns to the cup, raise theterror level by 1.
Sneak checks in Arkham are made at a -1 penalty.

Any investigator with Whiskey must pass a Sneak (-1) check or get arrested and taken to the Police Station. If this occurs, they must discard their Whiskey. In addition, Hibb's Roadhouse is closed until the end of next turn. Leave this card in play until then to indicate this
A rusty train arrives in Arkham, disgorging 2 monsters into the Northside streets
All Undead monsters have their toughness increased by 1
The festival has begun! Cultists and Byakhees have their toughness increased by 1.

Ongoing Effect: Cultists, Witches, Warlocks, and High Priests have their toughness increased by 2 while this card is in play. Place 1 clue token on this card at the end of every Mythos Phase (beginning the turn after it entered play)
Pass: If a single player discards 3 spells (4 if there are 5 or more players) while in the French Hill streets during the Arkham Encounters phase, return this card to the box. Each player gains 2 clue tokens.
Fail: If there are ever 5 Clue tokens on this card, return it to the box. From now on, draw 2 Mythos cards each Mythos Phase. Ignore everything on the first card except for the gate opening.

Mythos Ability: Investigators who end their movement in the French Hill streets may deal with the Man in Black to gain power. They roll dice equal to their current Sanity and for every failed die, the lose 1 Sanity. If this reduces them to 0 Sanity, they are devouredand the player must start a new character. Otherwise, they gain 1 Clue token and draw 1 Spell.

Ongoing Effect: Return one Ally from the Ally deck to the box at random at the end of every Mythos Phase while this card is in play (beginning the turn after it entered play). The Southside Strangler has struck again!
Pass: If a single player discards 5 Clue tokens while in Ma's Boarding House during the Arkham Encounters Phase, return this card to the box. Each player receives a $5 reward from the police
Fail: If there are no more Allies to return to the box at the end of the Mythos Phase, return this card to the box. Each player must lower either their maximum Sanity or Stamina (their choice) by 1 for the rest of the game

Mythos Ability: Ongoing Effect: Roll a die at the end of every Mythos Phase while this card is in play (beginning the turn after it enters play). On a 1 or 2, place one doom token on the ancient one's doom track.
Pass: If a player discards an Ally card while in the Downtown streets during the Arkham Encounter Phase, return this card to the box. Each player draws 2 Common Items.
Fail: If the Ancient One awakens, return this card to the box

Mythos Ability: Shuffle the mythos deck, being sure to include this card in it. After the deck is shuffled, draw a new mythos card for the turn

When this card enters play, place 5 monsters from the cup on it. Any player may choose to fight one or more of these monsters while in the Miskatonic U. streets during the Arkham Encounter Phase. If defeated, they are claimed as monster trophies. These monsters do not move, are not considered on the board, and do not count against the monster limit.
Pass: If there are no monsters on this card, return it to the box. Each player draws 1 Skill.
Fail: If there are 8 monsters on this card, return it to the box. Raise the terror level to 10 and place the monsters that were on it in play in the Miskatonic U. streets

Mythos Ability: Ghouls, Formless Spawns, Shoggoths and Flying Polyps have their toughness increased by 1
All monsters in the Downtown streets or locations are returned to the cup
An ancient curse strikes Arkham, releasing 2 monsters into the Rivertown streets
